function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Health and social workers have higher risk infectivity based on proximity and aggregation","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and infection among health and social workers","Mitigation":"Implement sector-specific safety guidelines and protocols, improve workplace characteristics, and provide timely communications about updated guidelines","Technologies":"Workplace layout adjustments, ventilation system improvements, administrative instructions for distancing","People":"Health and social workers, workers in education, arts, and entertainment","Owner":"Managers, business owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Workers in different sectors cannot be effectively protected from COVID-19 by a single safety guideline or protocol","Impact":"Potential for increased transmission and infection rates among workers in different sectors","Mitigation":"Develop sector-specific safety guidelines and protocols tailored to the unique risk factors of each sector","Technologies":"Sector-specific risk assessment frameworks, tailored safety guidelines, and protocols","People":"Workers in different sectors","Owner":"Health and safety experts, managers, workplace safety experts"},{"Description":"Workers must receive timely communications about updated guidelines and protocols","Impact":"Misunderstandings and misperceptions between managers and workers, leading to incorrect implementation of safety guidelines","Mitigation":"Establish clear and effective communication channels for disseminating updated guidelines and protocols to workers","Technologies":"Communication platforms, digital notification systems, training programs for managers and workers","People":"Workers, managers, workplace safety experts","Owner":"Managers, workplace safety experts"}]}
